title: My club has been removed (I have a question for Riot)

replies.body: Are there any members of your club that are in the club and can see the it?  There's been a few issues with clubs since it was restored after [downtime](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016), so hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help individually as well as share the feedback to our clubs team.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
I don't have my club. It was deleted and no one can see...
